multiple-choice.question: Let $n \geq 3$ be an integer. Consider a uniformly random permutation $a_1a_2 \dots a_n$ of the set $\{1,2,\dots,n\}$. Define the events [defs] A = "$a_n = n$", B = "$a_2 > a_1$". [/defs] Which of the following is true?
multiple-choice.answer: The events $A$ and $B$ are not independent.
